Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience. This product is a testament to our commitment to excellence and innovation. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $80. Considering its value, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at $100. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Thank you for your time and consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
